common Package¶

Description¶

Miscellaneous modules used to create a Z3 instance.

ClaferDatatype Module¶

Created on May 1, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

class common.ClaferDatatype.ClaferDatatype(z3, claferSort, isInteger=False)¶

Bases: builtins.object

Variables:
  • claferSort – (ClaferSort) ClaferSort for a given Clafer object from AST.
  • datatype – (ClaferDatatype) The Z3 Datatype for the given clafer. Datatype constructor is named new_sortName, where sortName = claferSort.id. The first field is always the same type as self.claferSort, and the remaining fields correspond to those added by addField(). If the Clafer is of type integer, an additional integer field called ref is added.
  • fields – ([ClaferSort]) List of all immediate subclafers.
  • isInteger – (bool) True if the Clafer is of type integer.
  • z3 – (Z3Instance) The Z3 solver.

Creates the Datatype for a given ClaferSort, which will be used to create the hierarchy of clafers.

Parameters:
  • z3 (Z3Instance) – The Z3 solver.
  • claferSort (ClaferSort) – ClaferSort for a given Clafer object from AST.
  • isInteger (bool) – True if the Clafer is of type integer.
addField(claferSort)¶
Parameters:claferSort (ClaferSort) – ClaferSort for a given Clafer object from AST

A new field is added for every child of the given clafer. Fields will become parameters for the Datatype constructor when generated.

generateDatatype()¶

Creates the actual Z3 Datatype.

ClaferSort Module¶

Created on Apr 29, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

class common.ClaferSort.ClaferSort(name)¶

Bases: builtins.object

Variables:
  • consts – ([Z3_Consts]) The list of Z3 Consts associated with this Sort.
  • id – (str) The string ID of the Sort
  • numConsts – The number of Z3 consts of this sort required to specify constraints over this Sort.
  • sort – Z3 Sort associated with the clafer, declared when Z3Instance is ran.

Contains necessary information for each clafer, and declares a Z3 Sort associated with it

Parameters:name (str) – The ID of the sort.
addConsts(newconsts)¶
Parameters:newconsts (int) – The number of Z3 consts of this sort required to specify the constraint that called this method. e.g. A lower bound cardinality constraint c with card (5,10) would call addConsts(11) to specify the upper bound.

Common Module¶

Created on Apr 28, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

common.Common.getOperationConversion(op)¶
Parameters:op (str) – String representation of Clafer operation.
Returns:4-tuple from ClaferToZ3OperationsMap with the fields:
The 4-tuple has the fields:
  1. arity
  2. equivalent operation(str) in Z3 (e.g. ‘&&’ maps to ‘And’)
  3. isPrefix(boolean), states whether the op is prefix or infix in Z3
  4. function associated with the operator

Z3Instance Module¶

Created on Apr 30, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

class common.Z3Instance.Z3Instance¶

Bases: builtins.object

Variables:
  • z3_constraints – ([constraints.Constraint]) Contains ALL constraints that will be fed into z3.
  • z3_sorts – ({str, common.ClaferSort}) Holds the Sorts for each clafer, mapped by the clafer’s ID.
  • z3_datatypes – ({common.ClaferSort, common.ClaferDatatype}) Maps each ClaferSort to its Datatype.
  • solver – (Z3_Solver) The actual Z3 solver.

Stores and instantiates all necessary constraints for the ClaferZ3 model.

addConstraint(constraint)¶
Parameters:constraint (constraints.Constraint) – A constraint.
addDatatype(claferSort, claferDatatype)¶
Parameters:
  • claferSort (common.ClaferSort) – A ClaferSort.
  • claferDatatype (common.ClaferDatatype) – A ClaferDatatype.

Maps the given ClaferSort to the ClaferDatatype in z3_datatypes.

addSort(sortID, sort)¶
Parameters:sort (common.ClaferSort) – A ClaferSort.
getConstraints()¶

‘ :returns: z3_constraints

getSorts()¶
Returns:z3_sorts
instantiateConstraints()¶

Calls generateConstraint() from each constraint.

instantiateConsts()¶

Instantiate the necessary number of consts for each ClaferSort.

instantiateDatatypes()¶

Instantiates a Datatype for each ClaferSort, which will be used to create the Clafer hierarchy.

instantiateSorts()¶

Declares z3 sorts.

run(__DEBUG__=False)¶
Parameters:__DEBUG__ ((bool (o))) – Prints out debug statements if true.

Runs the Z3Instance.

z3_constraints = []¶
z3_datatypes = {}¶
z3_sorts = {}¶
